Email.subject: A big W for Bob Yogurt
Email.content:
Hi $name,
Our public image sucks! That’s the problem!
PR dept. has provided me with a list of Bad things Bob Yogurt has done:
* funded a paramilitary mercenary group * embroiled in international diplomatic incident, sanctioned by the UN * social media team posted “lol @ humanitarian crises” on the official social media account
In short, $name, it's not good. We need to shore up our image, and we think you can help.
We’ve got a giant effigy labeled “hate”, we’d like you to annihilate it with the cosmic nullifier as part of a commercial.
The PR team assures me this will make a powerful statement and it might even go viral.
- Howard, CEO, Bob Yogurt
